name: Potato Panic
description:
In potato panic you play as the potato god and try to bring potatoes to a chef that has none

--Made in 3 hours For Trijam--

Everying you see in this game was made by me in the span of 3 hours

NOTES/DISCLAIMERS:

In the main menu it shows a mouse that has the left button clicked, Toward the end I  switched the art style and forgot to fix that so it is out of place

I forgot to say that you need to shoot the carrots in order to break them (using lmb)
